Inglewood.Washington Irving Branch:
Washington Irving Branch is a branch library of the Los Angeles Public Library, located west of downtown Los Angeles at 4117 West Washington Boulevard, Los Angeles.
The original building housing the branch (located at 1802 South Arlington Avenue, =, Los Angeles) is listed on the National Register of Historic Places but has been vacant and fenced for several years.


== Original branch ==
The original branch was located at 1802 South Arlington Avenue, Los Angeles, California.
